Articles.Content:
My friend and I use the same game version, mod version and obviously mods. However there is a difference, RemoteTech works for him normally, but for me it keeps saying N/A on the top left with the red calculator thing icon. I have no idea how to fix this, and no one has ever encountered this problem apparently since I can't find any answers, sp can anyone help?

Here is my log file: https://controlc.com/cd3fd7a6

Use password: 3901

Edited December 29, 2021 by JimTheGentlemanGR
